tutorial.title: Neighborhood Newspaper
tutorial.descriptionContent: A neighborhood newspaper project with HTML semantic elements

executableContent.instructions:
We're going to make a Neighborhood Newspaper to help out the community.

Let's begin building the structure of our Neighborhood Newspaper! Defining our newspaper's structure is essential to make sure the webpage is accessible.
1. Set the `lang` attribute of the `HTML` element to English.
2. Add a `<header>` element inside the `<body>`.
3. Include an `<h1>` element inside the `<header>` element with the followingÂ title  `Our Neighborhood Newspaper`.

Let's now include a navigation element and a list inside it with some descriptive links. The ` nav ` element is helpful in our newspaper because it helps to access the content we are looking for by providing navigational links. 1. Create a `
` element after the closing `
` tag. 2. Add an `

` element inside the `
` element with the text `Navigation to other newspapers`. 3. Create an `
    ` element inside the `
    ` element after the closing `

` tag. 4. Add two `
  • ` elements inside the `
      ` element. 5. Add a *descriptive link* inside each `
    • ` element, with the following descriptions: - `Visit the Atlantic Newspaper`. - `Visit the Financial Times`. 6. Include the following `href` values for the links: - ` "https://www.theatlantic.com/" `. - ` "https://www.ft.com/" `.

files.name: index.html
files.solvedContent:
Our Neighborhood Newspaper

Navigation to other newspapers

  • Visit the Atlantic Newspaper
  • Visit the Financial Times

hints.title: Hint
hints.content: Remember that ` <a> ` is the semantic element for links.

executableContent.instructions:
Now that we have the header and the navigation links, it's time to create the main section of the newspaper. Here we'll see the most important news of our community! 1. Add a `
` element after the closing `` tag. 2. Include a `
` element inside the `
` element. 2. Include an `

` element inside the `
` element with the text `Luminarias across the Lincoln Park`. 3. Add an image after the closing tag `

`, with the source `"https://mimo.app/i/light-bulb.png"`, and include the attribute `width` with value` "250" `. 4. This image is relevant, so include an alternative text within the `alt` attribute that describes the image. 5. Add an `

` element after the image, with the text `Messages from the president`.

hints.title: Hint
hints.content: Remember to add the width attribute and its value to the ` img ` so that it fits on the screen. Here is an example: ``` ```

executableContent.instructions:
Fantastic job! Of course, we need more content for our main story, let's continue by including a paragraph with a message from the president. 1. Add a `

` element after the closing `` tag with this text: ``` Wanted to share my happiness for the Luminaria event across Lincoln Park on Monday. Thank you to everyone that was involved. ```

executableContent.instructions:
To make sure the event and the venue stand out in the text, let's use some text formatting.

1. Use the `<strong>` tag to make `Luminaria` and `Lincoln Park` show in bold and stress their importance.

hints.title: Hint
hints.content: You can make a text important like this ``` important ```

executableContent.instructions:
This newspaper is looking good! Let's create a divider using a **decorative** image and then include another `section` that talks about a different topic. Avoid using generic containers, such as `span` and `div`, that don't provide context or any useful information about their contents. 1. After the closing section tag, add an `img` element with an empty value for the `alt` attribute, a `src` of `"https://mimo.app/i/library-image@3x.png"` and width `"80"`. 2. Create a `
` element after the new image. 3. Add a `

` element inside the new `
` element, with the text `Cocktail recipes`. 4. Add a `

` element after the closing `

` tag, with the following text: ``` Follow the recipes in their traditional form, then tweak them to your own liking. Look at everything the cocktail world has to offer. ```

Luminarias across the Lincoln Park

Messages from the president.

Wanted to share my happiness for the Luminaria event across Lincoln Park on Monday. Thank you to everyone that was involved.

Our Neighborhood Newspaper

Navigation to other newspapers

  • Visit the Atlantic Newspaper
  • Visit the Financial Times

Luminarias across the Lincoln Park

Messages from the president.

Wanted to share my happiness for the Luminaria event across Lincoln Park on Monday. Thank you to everyone that was involved.

Cocktail recipes

Follow the recipes in their traditional form, then tweak them to your own liking. Look at everything the cocktail world has to offer.

hints.title: Empty alt
hints.content: Remember decorative images do not provide useful information, so their `alt` attributes must be empty, like `alt=""`.

executableContent.instructions: Let's fill this Cocktail section with some recipes that the neighbors want to share. 1. Include an image after the closing `` tag with source `"https://mimo.app/i/cafe.png"`, width `"200"`, and the `alt` attribute with text related to the image. 2. After the image, include the sequential, correct-level-headings with the following texts: `Margarita`, `Contemporary Classics`, `Instructions:` 3. Include a paragraph with the following instructions: ``` Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass. ```

  • Visit the Financial Times

Luminarias across the Lincoln Park

Messages from the president.

Wanted to share my happiness for the Luminaria event across Lincoln Park on Monday. Thank you to everyone that was involved.

Cocktail recipes

Follow the recipes in their traditional form, then tweak them to your own liking. Look at everything the cocktail world has to offer.
files.solvedContent:
Our Neighborhood Newspaper

Navigation to other newspapers

  • Visit the Atlantic Newspaper
  • Visit the Financial Times

Luminarias across the Lincoln Park

Messages from the president.

Wanted to share my happiness for the Luminaria event across Lincoln Park on Monday. Thank you to everyone that was involved.

Cocktail recipes

Follow the recipes in their traditional form, then tweak them to your own liking. Look at everything the cocktail world has to offer.

Margarita

Contemporary Classics
Instructions:

Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass.

hints.title: Hint
hints.content: Remember headings follow numerical order. In this case we start with an `h4` for the first heading.

executableContent.instructions:
Great work! Let's add a button to allow the reader to see more cocktail recipes.

1. After the last paragraph element and before the closing `section` tag, Include a `<button>` element with the text `Show more recipes`.

Margarita

Contemporary Classics
Instructions:

Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass.

executableContent.instructions:
Did you notice that we used a decorative image to separate texts? We use empty `alt` attributes for the decorative images because assistive technologies ignore them. That way screen readers don't get distracted by irrelevant information. Let's create the final decoration image as a section divider and the footer of our newspaper! 1. Include a decorative `image` with an empty `alt` value, a source of `"https://mimo.app/i/library-image@3x.png"` and width `"80"` after the last closing `
` tag. 2. Add a `
` element after the closing `main` tag. 3. Add an unordered list with two items inside of the footer. 4. Include a `

` element inside each `

  • ` element with the following texts: - `2022 Our Neighborhood Newspaper` - `Terms of Service`
